Title: An Indecent Thanksgiving Proposal
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Lizzie Molyneux, Wendy Molyneux, Lizzie Molyneux (story editor), Kelvin Yu (story editor), Scott Jacobson (executive story editor), Holly Schlesinger (executive story editor), Wendy Molyneux (story editor), Steven Davis (story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: In order to entice an old flame who is only attracted to married men, Mr. Fischoeder bribes Bob into letting him pass off Linda and the kids as his own family, but the situation ruins all of Bob's Thanksgiving traditions.
